content.raw:
Hey Steven,

I should have been more straightforward and said that we on Exherbo[1] use that layout in our multiarch implementation[2], I just figured other distributions would set different prefixes as well to install binaries for different architectures to separate locations

Best regards

[1] http://exherbo.org/
[2] http://exherbo.org/docs/multiarch.txt

Hey Steven,

I should have been more straightforward and said that we on Exherbo[1] use that layout in our multiarch implementation[2], I just figured other distributions would set different prefixes as well to install binaries for different architectures to separate locations

Best regards
